summary: Encapsulates configuration details for a GeoTIFF raster data source and provides helper methods to instantiate the source, adapt it for prediction, serialize it to protobuf, save related bundle files, and update the configuration based on commands.
business_intent: Facilitate the integration and management of GeoTIFF inputs within machineâ€‘learning pipelines, allowing easy creation, serialization, and modification of source settings for training and inference tasks.
